Okay cool, Severedsolo is taking care of the issue with SCANsat.

New maintenance release, just some minor fixes here and there.  [Download now](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-FieldResearch/releases/tag/1.1.3)!

**ContractPack-FieldResearch 1.1.3**

- Strategia integration.
- SCANsat support - bodies need a biome scan before Field Research contracts are offered (thanks severedsolo).
- Rewrote some contracts using the ITERATOR functionality to reduce complexity.
- Improvements to Scientist contracts.
Did the duplicafe/near-duplicate contracts get fixed? Just asking as I see no mention of it.

> 
> 
> 27 minutes ago, smjjames said:
> 
> 
> Did the duplicafe/near-duplicate contracts get fixed? Just asking as I see no mention of it.
> 

Forgot to put that in the log - duplicate prevention should be working again now, yes.

The near-duplicate contracts are still happening, I got these two while trying to get field research contracts for the Mun to spawn. I double checked the version file in gamedata and yes, I am using 1.1.3

Okay, the contracts without parameters is pretty serious, so new release to fix both those issues (I'd missed a couple contracts for the duplicates).  Download [here](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-FieldResearch/releases/tag/1.1.4).

**ContractPack-FieldResearch 1.1.4**

- Fixed contracts without any parameters (thanks smjjames).
- Fixed near-duplicate geological and climate contracts (thanks smjjames).

Okay cool. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

and welcome.

Bug:

I got a contract to do a seismic scan on the Minmus **Midlands**, **Greater Flats**, and **Flats**.

When I landed in the **Greater** **Flats** and did the scan, the contract objective for **Flats** was also fulfilled.

Anybody else having problems with the 'help a scientist perform experiments at location on <planet moon="">'s <biome>' not actually completing?
</biome></planet>

I've done all the needed steps, even had the scientist do an experiment (EVA report or surface sample) at the site, but it's not completing after I recover at Kerbin. I haven't tried recovering the scientist only instead of the whole ship though to see if that works.

>

Ah yup, I broke it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

I'd fixed the exploit where you didn't actually need to be at the waypoint to do the experiment.  Problem is my fix only works if you also recover from the waypoint - which is fine because I was testing on Kerbin.  Minmus...  not so much.

I'll release a fix later today.

lol.......

New release, download [here](https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractPack-FieldResearch/releases/tag/1.1.5).

**ContractPack-FieldResearch 1.1.5**

- Fixed various issues with the scientist contracts (thanks smjjames).

I was able to screw one of contracts and still be able to complete it. One of those that require to bring tourist scientist to the waypoint, do some experiment/research and recover research and scientist at KSC runway.

I didn't readed carefully contract text, so I after I was done with research on required spot, everything was triggered properly on contract, but on the way back I have transmitted data along with some other crew reports/research. I have landed safely on runway and contract have recognized safe recovery of scientist, but contract was not finished. That was point I realized my mistake.

So, insead of loadin older save, I have repeated the same. After landing on desired spot, I did some science experiment and contract was finished imediately, without need to return on KSC runway because it was triggered before in previous trip.

It was not big deal, besides looking odd, I was able to continue game and other contracts shows properly. Don't know if it is possible to "uncheck" condition that scientist is already recoverd to prevent this exploit in future. Sorry, I forot to save output log from those trips.

> 
>

>

Funny thing is, I fixed this by removing the requirement to recover the science about a week ago, but haven't released the change yet. I'll do that this weekend.

Found issue with surface sample contract. I got checked surface sample experiment, but parrent contract part is not triggered as solved.  

When I landed on runway, contract was not calculated as finished either. Might be confusing if contract require surface sample with some of DMagic device or it must be collected with EVA. Don't know if it is case for encountered issue.
